data.name: WhoIamTitle
data.value: Who I am and how I handle your data

data.name: WhoIamText
data.value: Iâ€™m Lucas Hafner, and this is my personal page where I showcase my projects. I want you to know that I respect your privacy and the only data I ask for is your email when you use the contact form.

data.name: WhatDataText
data.value: I only collect your email when you leave it in the form so I can respond to you.

data.name: EmailUsageTitle
data.value: What I use your email for

data.name: EmailUsageText
data.value: I use your email exclusively to reply to your messages and inquiries, and to contact you about topics related to my projects if necessary.

data.name: HowIProtectText
data.value: I safeguard your data with security measures to prevent unauthorized access or loss.

data.name: NoSharingTitle
data.value: I do not share your email

data.name: NoSharingText
data.value: Your email will not be sold or shared with anyone. I will only use it for the purposes I mentioned and nothing else.

data.name: YourRightsText
data.value: If you want me to delete or correct your email, just write to me at lucasezequielhafner@gmail.com and I will do it.

data.name: CookiesUsageText
data.value: This site may use cookies to improve your experience, but you can configure your browser to block them if you want.

data.name: QuestionsText
data.value: If you have any questions about how I handle your information, write to me at lucasezequielhafner@gmail.com
